com.github.timoteoponce.paginator
Class Paginator<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.github.timoteoponce.paginator.Paginator<T>
Type Parameters:
T - working object type
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Paginator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Core component handling pagination operations. It provides pagination operations and pages information; additionally provides an event-listener model that is triggered every time a pagination action modifies the current page (all 'go' operations).

Author:
Timoteo Ponce, Rory Sandoval - original implementation
See Also:
Serialized Form

getList

public java.util.List<T> getList()
Returns current page's list. If there's not result at all, it returns an empty list.

Returns:
current page's list, or an empty list when there's not data
